channel.title: English on Layer 7
channel.description: Recent content in English on Layer 7

item.title: Expression
item.description: Words Amenable : willing to accept or be influenced by a suggestion; 意为顺从的，愿意接受建议的，耳朵软的之类的意思。在 OpenFlow 一文中，作者将 Amenable 放在句首，来表达需要实现的功能。 Amenable to high-performance and low-cost implementations. sophisticated having
